description.en: Takepile is a decentralized perpetual exchange on Fantom offering low fees, no-slippage trading, no funding rates, and guaranteed solvency through its novel "pile" liquidity system. The TAKE token is a fixed-supply utility token enabling trading fee share for TAKE stakers on the Takepile Protocol.
